alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Ask yourself: if the peer review process really works, why are you still reading super-natural and irrational poppycock such as time travel, black holes, and annihilation in allegedly scientific journals and magazines such as Nature, Science, and Scientific American? You should be reading these fairy tales in fiction mags! Or perhaps we should rename Nature as Fantasy and Science as Science Fiction!"

- Bill Gaede, youstupidrelativist.com
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Peer Review Has Failed to Eliminate Metaphysics from Our Scientific Journals
